meanings.sent1: I enjoy watching a vodcast about cooking on my phone.
meanings.sent2: She subscribed to a vodcast series about travel adventures.
meanings.sent3: The vodcast on gardening made me want to plant a jungle in my backyard!
meanings.sent4: The vodcast on space exploration took me on a journey to the stars.
meanings.sent5: The vodcast on marine life was so fascinating, I felt like I was swimming with the fish.

meanings.definition: To create or distribute a video podcast.
meanings.sent1: He decided to vodcast his own show to share his knowledge with others.
meanings.sent2: They vodcasted the event live for their online audience.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally vodcasted my cat's nap instead of the cooking tutorial!
meanings.sent4: She vodcasts her daily adventures, turning them into captivating stories.
meanings.sent5: Vodcasting the concert allowed fans from around the world to tune in.
